error.invalid_login: Incorrect username or password. Please try again.
error.connection: Unable to reach server. Please check your internet connection or contact administrator.
error.servererror: Unable to access this service. Please try again later or contact administrator.
error.overloaded: The server is currently overloaded. Please try again later or contact administrator.
error.access_error: Unable to access mailbox folder, please contact administrator.
error.ip_mismatch: Your IP has changed, you will be logged out. To prevent this problem in the future, please access WebClient via HTTPS connection.
error.sso_error: Error when trying to use SSO login
error.account_alternative_email: Account has no alternate email address. Please contact admin
error.account_disabled_1: Could not login because of IP Restriction
error.account_disabled_2: Could not login because account is disabled
error.account_disabled_3: Could not login because password is expired
error.account_disabled_4: Could not login because account expired
error.account_disabled_5: Could not login because of SMTP access mode
error.account_disabled_6: Could not login because of POP/IMAP access mode
error.account_disabled_7: Could not login because account is IMAP only
error.account_disabled_8: Could not login because account is POP3 only
error.account_disabled_9: Could not login because account has no access rights to WebClient
error.account_disabled_10: Could not login because of access mode
error.account_disabled_11: Could not login because login to this domain is disabled
error.account_disabled_12: Could not login because domain expired
error.account_disabled_13: Could not login because of license
error.account_missing_required_property: Some of the required properties is missing
error.account_no_password: Account password is missing or empty
error.account_no_username: Account username is missing or empty
error.account_password_policy: Password does not match the password policy
error.account_signup_disabled_ip: Admin has disabled signup from your IP
error.contact_support_no_admin_email: Administrator has not set up an email address
error.folder_get_list: Cannot get the list of folders
error.groupware_db_connection: GroupWare is unable to connect to database
error.groupware_upgrade_task: GroupWare service update procedure is running. Please try again later.
error.migration_in_progress: Migration of account is in progress, please try again later
error.no_teamchat_folders: Unable to login due to missing teamchat folder
error.password_not_changed: New password cannot be the same as old password
error.personality_confirmation_invalid_hashid: Email address cannot be confirmed: Invalid Hash
error.personality_confirmation_invalid_user: Email address cannot be confirmed: Invalid User
error.rsa_create_key_pair: Unable to create RSA key pair
error.session_no_user: Session user object cannot be retrieved
error.setting_file_corrupted: Webmail server settings are corrupted. Please, contact the administrator.

forgot-password.heading: Forgot password
forgot-password.success-message: Email has been sent to your alternative email address
forgot-password.success-message-guest: Email has been sent to your email address

gateway-login.subheading: Sign in with an administrator account to manage domains and users

set-password.code_sent_to: Verification code has been sent to *%{to}*.
set-password.heading: You're almost done!

tc-actions.heading: Plus button actions
tc-actions.subheading: Make it easy to manage all TeamChat actions using the multi action '+' button.

tc-check-email.heading: Check your email
tc-check-email.subheading: Verify your email address and then use the **combination of your email address and password to join in** and chat with other users in TeamChat room **%{room}**

tc-collaboration.heading: Collaboration in teams
tc-collaboration.subheading: Exchange ideas, files or other data and discuss in different groups in real-time.

tc-join.heading: Join our TeamChat
tc-join.subheading: %{name} invited you to join TeamChat room _%{room}_
tc-join.username-helper: Add name as it will appear in TeamChat

tc-share.heading: Share everything easily
tc-share.subheading: Drag & drop any documents or media - share and edit them right within the app.

two_step.heading: Two step verification
two_step.subheading: Please enter 6 digit code from IceWarp Authenticator app
two_step.subheading-phone: Please enter 6 digit code sent to your phone number ending -%{phone}

validation.alpha_chars: Field has to contain at least %{amount} letter||||Field has to contain at least %{amount} letters
validation.non_alpha_num_chars: Field has to contain at least %{amount} non-alphanumeric character||||Field has to contain at least %{amount} non-alphanumeric characters
validation.numeric_chars: Field has to contain at least %{amount} number||||Field has to contain at least %{amount} numbers
validation.upper_alpha_chars: Field has to contain at least %{amount} uppercase letter||||Field has to contain at least %{amount} uppercase letters
